summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's Fresh Start Gel Cleanser is a daily PHA cleanser that washes away pore-clogging dirt and debris without leaving your skin dry and irritated. This gentle but thorough science-backed formula soothes while it cleanses, leaving your face feeling clean, fresh, and balanced.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor all skin types: dry, oily, combination, sensitive, and acne-proneGel TextureFragrance FreeKey IngredientsSpearmint Extract helps refresh and calm.Caffeine soothes and calms skin while reducing redness and puffiness.Aloe Leaf Juice is an antioxidant that protects, soothes, and moisturizes.Red Algae Extract helps reduce oil production.Lavender Flower Water calms, purifies, and soothes skin.Gluconolactone is a powerhouse PHA (polyhydroxy acid) that works to exfoliate the outermost layer of skin, even out tone and texture, and remove excess oil. Because of its gentle nature, it‚Äôs also perfect for sensitive skin.Formulated WithoutDenatured alcoholsParabensArtificial colorAdded fragranceItem 2600875How To UseMassage 1-2 pumps onto wet skin to create a light foam. Rinse well and pat dry. Use day and night.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Copolymer, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Rhodophyceae Extract, Caffeine, Butylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Massage 1-2 pumps onto wet skin to create a light foam. Rinse well and pat dry. Use day and night.

reviews.headline: This REALLY Surprised Me
reviews.comments: Bubble is probably my favorite skincare brand, but I hate to say it but this might be my least favorite product. I'm not saying it's HORRIBLE but I feel like it's super sticky and gluey and even after I washed it off it left my face all sticky, too.

reviews.headline: Sticky???
reviews.comments: i bought this cleanser the other day, I am a HUGE bubble fan, and I have oily, maybe combo skin. I thought this would work for me, but when I put it on my face, it felt like a tacky primer. it pulled on my skin when I moved it over my face and only became normal until I emulsified it. Even after washing it off, my skin felt very dry.

reviews.headline: I will continue my shopping
reviews.comments: Yes i bought these products for my granddaughter,its our time visiting your store .she was satisfied .

reviews.headline: I am absolutely buying this product again!
reviews.comments: This face wash is amazing. This is the second time I have bought it and it does wonders on my skin. It makes my skin feel like all of the gunk and dirt had left my skin and pores. It's absolutely amazing!

reviews.headline: Slightly stripping, dry skin beware
reviews.comments: I've used this cleanser for a long time and I like it a lot. The only drawback I've come to find is that it works almost too well. It gets everything off, but it leaves my skin dry. Almost like a clarifying cleanser. As long as you moisturize really well after this product, you're all set.

reviews.headline: 30 years old and I love it.
reviews.comments:
Im attracted to colorful things. While neutrals are in, the kid in me will forever be attracted to colorful things. 

I got travel minis to try this and the blue gel cleanser is my absolute favorite - i bought it full size. While im 30, i still struggle with acne sometimes and im super oily in summer and dry in winter. This thoroughly cleans my face, while still feeling comfortable. My face looks brighter and ive noticed less acne or spots using this. I have sensitive skin as well - no issues for me. 

I have ditched everything i use for this line. While im sure its not as rich as products designated for maturing skin, i contest that their products at high dollar doesnt even work that good. This is affordable AND works. 

Thank you for this line. Please do not ever make the mistake of changing formulas. Your products have good reviews for a reason.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS
reviews.comments: Great for sensitive dry skin

reviews.headline: Fresh start gel cleanser
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser. It makes my skin very soft and feels very clean, but I don't think this does anything for my acne

reviews.headline: I love this‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: This product is so gentle on my sensitive skin so I'm glad to find a product like this it's so hard finding skincare for my skin because I have a combination of different skin problems, oily, dry, acne, and etc, I'm so glad I found this super cheap‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: I was previously using the WLDKAT gel cleanser and my face was the most clear it was ever been. Then the company closed and I proceeded to have some of the worst acne I had since my teen years as I tried so many different products. Hundreds of dollars and a year later, I decided to give this Bubble gel cleanser a try. After the first use I noticed how soft my face felt, and within 2 weeks almost all the acne I had cleared up. I use this in combination with the cocokind electrolyte water cream, the ordinary nicainamide, and murad acne control pads, and now my face is soft, clear, and I've even noticed a difference in the fine lines on my forehead. Thank you Bubble for making such a wonderful product, and please never change it!

reviews.headline: Best cleanser for dry skin!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser! I have pretty dry skin and this helps it feel clean without stripping any moisture! Two pumps is the perfect ratio for the best lather!

reviews.headline: DONT BUY
reviews.comments: this gives me breakouts and smells like eggs. I got the big one and it only lasted 5 times. it is expensive and a scam. don't buy

reviews.headline: Loyal customer ü§û
reviews.comments: I've been using this cleanser for the past 4 years and I would highly recommend it. It never broke out my skin or caused any irritation. Absolutely love this product! I have tried other cleansers over the years and nothing had worked better than this cleanser.

reviews.headline: Its stopped working
reviews.comments: Its an ok cleanser i mean it is sticky and takes forever to get off but after i used it like 4 times the bottle broke and it wont dispince any of the cleanser but its almost full. Huge waste of money

reviews.headline: Needs new packaging but works
reviews.comments: As others have said, this face wash can be a bit drying so its def not for the dry skin crowd. I dont mind too much as i have oily skin. It removes makeup and cleans well. However there is a reason pump bottles have long necks. The pump is just too short. You cannot put your hand underneath. You need to pick up the bottle and pump sideways into your palm and even then product still trails down the bottle. I get aesthetics are a thing but just make the bottle normal, please.

reviews.headline: Do not buyüò¨
reviews.comments: I thought this would be a good product for my oily skin but it just made it my face dried out and it also didn't help my oily skin

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: best cleanser i have EVER used. takes away every single bump from my face and makes my skin SO smooth and even. only cleanser i will ever use ever again.

reviews.headline: Really recommend cleanser
reviews.comments: I would so recommend this cleanser because it doesn't burn if it gets in your eyes and it is really nice and refreshing

reviews.headline: I recommend this product
reviews.comments: This helped with my sensitive skin and it made my face so much more smoother. I am gonna repurchase this forever, btw my dog is puppy so he chews on anything he sees. I also own more things from bubble like the sunscreen, vitamin C eye cream, and of course the slam dunk moisturizer.

media.headline: Very gentle cleanser good for young skin

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have sensitive skin and it also becomes oily in my T-zone area, so I have to be careful with what I put on my skin or else I break out in red spots, or my skin gets dry, irritated and it peels. With that being said, I can truly say that this cleanser works for me without a doubt, and I don't have those issues when I use it. I use 3 pumps to clean my skin and I follow up with their "Slam Dunk" hydrating moisturizer (a little of that goes a long way). I'm about to purchase a second bottle and the vitamin C serum (I don't remember the full name; I just know it's in a small yellow bottle). 
They have won me over. The fact that you have to tilt the bottle to use it is a small price to pay compared to buying a product and wasting your money. Finally a product that actually does what it says it does.
faceoff_positive.headline: I love this product!

faceoff_negative.comments: (P.S I bought and tried this a while ago but I could never find my review) Ok, so just for background, I have dry and sensitive skin. I read that one of the ingredients is not really good for sensitive skin in one of the reviews (this was AFTER I got it). For me, it kind of dryed my skin out (not to the point I'm peeling though) and made my skin feel sensitive. It could be that it was delivered to my house instead of me getting it at Ulta, but I don't know. I think it's just that it's made more toward oily skin because of an ingredient called red algae extract, which in the pics they state helps control oil production, which dry skin types don't need. So I think it would be great for someone else with non-sensitive and skin. So I recommend it for people with oily and non-sensitive skin. If you do have dry and or sensitive skin, I rcecommend Soft Launch because that is amazing for me so far. So yeah. Bye yallüíñüíÖüèº
faceoff_negative.headline: This is okay
